mapper.update: merge into tco_user_token t1 using (select '${userId}' user_id,'${token}' token from dual) t2 on (t1.user_id = t2.user_id) when matched then update set t1.token = t2.token when not matched then insert values (t2.user_id, t2.token)
mapper.select: select token from tco_user_token where user_id= #{userId}
